content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (-5.5, 19.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam Engine at position (-5.5, 19.5)
- Boiler at position (-2.5, 24.0)
- Offshore Pump at position (-9.5, 24.5)
- Pipe Group connecting the Offshore Pump and Boiler at positions (-9.5, 23.5) and (-5.5, 16.5)
- Electricity Group at position (-5.4, 20.0) (currently not plugged into the electric network)

### Small Electric Poles
- Small Electric Pole at position (-7.5, 18.5)
- Small Electric Pole at position (-7.5, 17.5)
- Small Electric Pole at position (-0.5, 17.5)
- Small Electric Pole at position (-0.5, 19.5)

### Stone Furnace
- Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) (currently no ingredients)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Connecting Pipes
- Ensure you have enough pipes in your inventory before attempting to connect entities.
- Verify that the pipes are correctly aligned and can connect between the intended entities.

### Errors with Electric Network
- Ensure that all electricity-related entities are properly connected to the electric network.
- Place electric poles within range to connect the electricity group to the network.

### Errors with Fuel Management
- Regularly check the fuel status of boilers and ensure they have sufficient fuel to operate.

### Errors with Inventory Management
- Keep track of your inventory to ensure you have the necessary items before attempting to place or connect entities.

### Errors when Placing Entities
- Double-check the availability of items in your inventory before attempting to place entities like small electric poles.
- Ensure that the target tile is unoccupied and suitable for placing the intended entity.

### Index Errors in Code
- Ensure that your code handles cases where lists may be empty to avoid index errors.
